reviews.customers_say: Customers like the dress's fabric quality, with one noting it's breathable, and appreciate its perfect length and comfortable fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress - Versatile for summer and fall
items.body: Don't wait run go buy this dress you will not be disappointed! The style, comfort, and the material are amazing. The fit runs slightly large so size down. I am 5" 1 and my weight fluctuates between 130 and 145 and I had room to spare. Now that fall is here I have more options. Throw a sweater over top and a pair of boots and you have a dress that you can wear year round. Read more
items.author: Shopping Diva

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice comfortable dress
items.body: I am impressed by this little dress. It is a light weight rayon, polyester, spandex material. It doesn’t feel or look cheap. The arm holes have a lining so they don’t gap or show your under clothes. It comes in both a crew neck and a v-neck. I bought both and chose to keep the v-neck as I like this style on me better. I am 5’6.5” and weigh 140. The medium fit me perfectly and it is not form fitting. It fits loosely so doesn’t show all your imperfections but still indents a little at the waist so has shape to it. I only gave this 4 stars vs 5 as I do not know how it wears with washing over time. I bought the navy and ordered a second in the dark coffee. Read more
items.author: Diamond

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great summer /date night dress
items.body: I was skeptical about how this dress would look on me. I was pleasantly surprised. It is very flattering on. The little sleeve gives it flair. I love the pockets. I am 5'4 and it hits above my ankles. Perfect length for me. It is very flattering. Perfect for date nights. I pair with a denim jacket. Nice material. Not to thick or thin. Comfort: Very comfortable Fit: True to size Read more
items.author: Jphelps

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and quality.
items.body: Great fit. Not too tight and not too loose. A great length too. Not too long. Love the side splits and the fabric. Nice thick fabric that drapes well and resists wrinkles. Washes nice too. Can dress up or be casual. Read more
items.author: Angela S.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not crazy about the material for a warm weather trip
items.body: Sadly, this felt like a buttery polyester type material. It is soft, but I’m looking for more natural fibers like cotton and linen to take on a trip to Italy. I just don’t think this would be comfortable however I do see this being a perfect dress for just running around or relaxing at home. It does feel very stretchy, soft And comfy. I ordered the size I normally do which is a large and it felt comfortable and perfect. I did return the dress ultimately because I am focused on finding dresses for the trip and this just didn’t work for me. Read more
items.author: Kelly O'B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and makes you look put together.
items.body: Comfortable! Easy to wear dress. Can wear as is or add a jean jacket with a necklace stack. Great to wear during the day and can convert it to an evening outfit. It's a long dress but the slits on the side make it more carefree. This is one of my go to dresses. Read more
items.author: Carol B.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Weird neckline on v-neck, BUT round-neck is great!
items.body: I own three of these dresses, BUT all of them have the round neck. I love the feel of the fabric and the cut. It’s flattering, especially for a dress that has pockets. I did NOT like the v-neck though and returned it. Easy return. Read more
items.author: Hildi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit fabric style
items.body: Everything was great except the color Not pretty, not like the picture Too dark Read more
items.author: Sofia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Khaki, Royal Blue, Army Green, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Denim Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
